action: Run your A/C in temperature mode
action_description: This Action will turn on your A/C in the specified room, and run it in Temperature mode.
This Action will provide Comfort feedback for the device that you specified.
This Action will turn off your A/C in the specified room.

action: Run your A/C in away mode
action_description: This Action will turn on your A/C in the specified room, and run it in Away mode.

action: Run your A/C in comfort mode
action_description: This Action will turn on your A/C in the specified room, and run it in Comfort mode.
